mapper.select: SELECT a.id rid,a.name,a.type,a.gmt_start,a.gmt_end,a.gmt_pstart,sum(b.limit_count) limitCount, a.goods_limit_count,a.pay_type,MIN(b.special_price) specialPrice FROM af_seckill_activity a LEFT JOIN af_seckill_activity_goods b ON (a.id=b.activity_id) WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND b.is_delete=0 AND b.goods_id=#{goodsId ,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY a.gmt_create DESC limit 1
